data.name: lblCRWH.Help

data.name: lblThumbPagiEasing.Help
data.value: The easing function that the thumbnails page switch effect will use. The default is swing.

data.name: lblSocialLoadAfterEffect.Help
data.value: If enabled, the social buttons for the current item will load only after the it's transition effect has completed

data.name: lblCategoryGalleryEmpty.Text
data.value: No gallery in category, go to manage content!

data.name: lblCategoryListEmpty.Text
data.value: No list in category, go to manage content!

data.name: lblSelectCategoryGallery.Text
data.value: Select category and gallery then rotator settings will show up!

data.name: lblSelectCategoryList.Text
data.value: Select category and list then rotator settings will show up!

data.name: lblGallerySettingsTitleAdjust.Text
data.value: Adjust your Rotator for perfect view

data.name: lblNewsCleanUpTime.HelpText
data.value: Here you can set up the number of days prior to the clean-up of images.

data.name: lblNewsCleanUpTime.Text
data.value: Clean up images not used after:

data.name: lblPermissionSource.HelpText
data.value: Here you can select which permissions will be used by the rotator module to display articles to the users. In the rotator there are no permissions that could limit users' ability to see articles, but the rotator module can load permissions from the news module, thus displaying articles in accordance with permissions from the news module to the users. Available choices are None, Portal and Module. If None is selected, the rotator module will use no permissions at all. If Portal is selected, the rotator module will use permissions set up to be valid across the whole DNN portal for EasyDNNnews module. If Module is selected, you can choose between some of the EasyDNNnews module's instances on the portal whose permissions will be used.

data.name: lblUseGeneralSettingsAll.Text
data.value: Please contact your administrator to activate the module.

data.name: lblUseScheduler.HelpText
data.value: If this option is selected, the scheduler will automatically clean up the images and thumbnails not used in the rotator anymore. Images used in the news module will not be subjected to this clean-up.

data.name: ClientValidateAuthors.ErrorMessage
data.value: Please select at least one author.

data.name: cvDinamicTreeView.ErrorMessage
data.value: Please select at least one category.

data.name: lblFeaturedArticles.HelpText
data.value: If this option is selected, the rotator will only display those articles that are marked as Featured articles in the news module.

data.name: lblNewsCategoriesSelect.HelpText
data.value: Select the categories for the articles to be displayed from. 'Display All Articles' will display articles from all categories. If you unselect 'Display All Articles', you can choose individual categories for the articles to be displayed from.

data.name: lblNewsCategoriesSelect.Text
data.value: Select categories for articles to be displayed from:

data.name: lblOpenInNewsModule.HelpText
data.value: If you have multiple instances of the news module on your portal, here you can select that instance of the news module where you wish the article details to be opened.

data.name: lblOpenInNewsModule.Text
data.value: Select instance of the news module where articles will be opened:

data.name: lblShowAllAuthors.HelpText
data.value: Select the authors from the news module whose articles you wish to be displayed in the rotator. 'Display All Authors' will display the articles by all authors. If you unselect 'Display All Authors', you can choose individual authors whose articles you wish to be displayed in the rotator.

data.name: lblShowAllAuthors.Text
data.value: Select authors whose articles will be displayed:

data.name: lblChameleonBorder.HelpText
data.value: Main container border size and color.

data.name: lblChameleonDragNavigation.HelpText
data.value: This option enables support for touch input devices such as iPhone, iPad... The chameleon can be controlled by mouse dragging or moving.

data.name: lblChameleonStrechImage.HelpText
data.value: If an image is smaller than the item panel, it will be stretched out to fit the panel.

data.name: lblCRmainPanelImageAlign.HelpText
data.value: Alignes image in main panel like selected value.

data.name: lblCropMethod.HelpText
data.value: Resizes main image with selected method when generating images.

data.name: lblCRTooltipDescriptLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in description string to display in tooltip. Depends on html css tags in string.

data.name: lblCRTooltipTitleLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in title string to display in Item Container

data.name: lblHideUnlocalizedItems.HelpText
data.value: Articles that do not have content for selected language won't be shown. For example on the sites with three different languages: English (default), German and Italian. Article is localized to Italian language. When selecting German language article won’t be visible because there is no localization. Article will only be shown on Italian and English language which is default. Hint: You can also turn off displaying languages on the default language. For articles that you do not want to show on the default language you need to go to Edit article > Content localization and Turn on option “Do not show articles on the default language”.

data.name: lblHideUnlocalizedItems.Text
data.value: Do not show articles if they do not have content for selected language:

data.name: lblHtmTemplate.HelpText
data.value: Template is located at ../Controls/ControlName/static/themes/templates/ You can edit, modify, create new templates and combine them with tokens.

data.name: lblIsSocialInstance.HelpText
data.value: Displays user's and group's articles on the Activity feed. The articles are filtered by the UserID or GroupID querystring. If this option is enabled and the querystring UserID or GroupID is missing, then the articles won't show up.

data.name: lbljsFallback.HelpText
data.value: Shows first image of selected list.

data.name: lbljsFallback.Text
data.value: If JavaScript is disabled, use fallback:

data.name: lblNewsDescriptionSource.HelpText
data.value: Choose between two options. The first one, 'Use article summary as description' takes the article's summary and uses it as description in the rotator. The other option, 'Use article content as description' takes the article's content and uses it as description in the rotator.

data.name: lblNewsEvents.HelpText
data.value: If this option is selected, the rotator will only display events from the news module. Other articles, which are not events, will not be displayed.

data.name: lblNewsSelectMethod.HelKey
data.value: Choose between two options. The first one, 'Display all articles from selected categories' will display all articles from selected categories, disregarding how many of them there are. The other option, 'Display a set number of articles from each category' limits the overall number of articles to be loaded from each selected category.

data.name: lblnsOnlyWithImages.HelpText
data.value: If this option is selected, the rotator will only display those articles from the news module that contain a main article image. The main article image can be added from add/edit form of the news module.

data.name: lblnsOnlyWithImages.Text
data.value: Display articles with main article image only:

data.name: lblNumOfNewsPerCat.Text
data.value: Maximum number of articles per category:

data.name: lblNumToRotate.HelpText
data.value: Number of items that will be rotated. (0 for all)

data.name: lblNumToRotate.Text
data.value: Number of items that will be rotated:

data.name: lblOrderArticlesBy.HelpText
data.value: Choose the manner of listing the articles loaded from the news module.

data.name: lblRotatorLoadSettings.HelpText
data.value: Settings from other Module instance(DB), and XML files(ModulePath/PreSettings/).

data.name: lblRotatorTemplate.HelpText
data.value: Select original or custom template control

data.name: lblRotatorTheme.HelpText
data.value: Select theme and style for rotator.

data.name: liDisplayallarticles.Text
data.value: Display all articles from selected categories.

data.name: liDisplaymaximumnumber.Text
data.value: Display maximum number of articles per category.

data.name: lblcrResizeToContent.Help
data.value: Title, description box resizes depending on text length.

data.name: lblAlignList.Help
data.value: Aligne list left or right acording main rotator width.

data.name: lblARDescriptionLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in description string to display in text box. Depends on html css tags in string.

data.name: lblARMainPictureWH.Text
data.value: Width and height of main picture and container in pixels.

data.name: lblARSubTitleLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in subtitle string to display in list item.

data.name: lblARThumbWH.Help
data.value: Width, height of thumb in pixels.

data.name: lblARTitleLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in title string to display in list item and description container.

data.name: lblAutoAdjust.Help
data.value: Items position are automatically adjusted when image rotates.

data.name: lblcbTISync.Help
data.value: If true, text box appears after image transition is completed.

data.name: lblcpalig.Help
data.value: The alignment of the control panel.

data.name: lblCPappears.Help
data.value: Control panel appears only on mouseover and hides on mouseout.

data.name: lblCurrImageNum.Help
data.value: To specify if the current image number is visible.

data.name: lblDelay.Help
data.value: The global time delay for image rotation in milliseconds. If delay is set per item, it will take precedence over this global delay

data.name: lblDelayBlock.Help
data.value: The delay until the next block transition occurs in sequence. (in milliseconds)

data.name: lblDelayHS.Help
data.value: The delay until the next horizontal stripe transition occurs in sequence. (in milliseconds)

data.name: lblDisplayButton.Help
data.value: To specify if the play/pause button is visible.

data.name: lblHorizonStrip.Help
data.value: The size of the horizontal stripes use for horizontal stripe transitions.

data.name: lblImageRotationStart0.Help
data.value: Specify if image rotation initially starts.

data.name: lblItemSeize.Help
data.value: The width, height a list item in pixel.

data.name: lblNumListItems.Help
data.value: Number of list items in list items container.

data.name: lblPlayOnce.Help
data.value: Specify if rotation plays only once through.

data.name: lblPouseMouseover.Help
data.value: Rotation pauses on mouseover and resumes on mouseout.

data.name: lblScrollBar.Help
data.value: To specify if the scroll bar indicator is visible.

data.name: lblScrollingType.Help
data.value: The scrolling type use for navigating the list. If you specify "none", navigation of list is done through item click.

data.name: lblSelArrow.Help
data.value: To specify if the selected item's arrow is visible.

data.name: lblShuffle.Help
data.value: To specify if items are displayed in random order.

data.name: lblSizeBlock.Help
data.value: The size of the blocks use for block transitions.

data.name: lblTBTitleLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in title string to display in text box. Depends on html css tags in string.

data.name: lblTBWH.Help
data.value: Dimensions of text box on top of main picture.

data.name: lbltimeindicator.Help
data.value: To specify if the timer indicator bar is visible.

data.name: lbltimeralign.Help
data.value: The alignment of the timer indicator.

data.name: lblTransition.Help
data.value: The global transition use for images. If transition is set per item, it will take precedence over this global transition.

data.name: lblTransitionSpeed.Help
data.value: The transition speed/duration use for image transition in milliseconds.

data.name: lbltxtBoxMouse0.Help
data.value: Text box appears only on mouseover and hides on mouseout.

data.name: lblCarouselAutoplay.Help
data.value: If 0 ms then autoplay is off.

data.name: lblCarouselEasing.Help
data.value: Determines the animation style when changing items/pages.

data.name: lblCarouselInfinite.Help
data.value: Loop content. (Works if options are set like: Case 1: orientation is set to horizontal and rotator has only one row, Case 2: orientation is set to vertical and rotator has 1 column. In both cases width and height are set in pixels and it will work, else if either are set as fluid, it depends on how many rows/columns will be generated and may not work.)

data.name: lblCarouselRSliderHPXInfo.Text
data.value: ((item height + item top and bottom padding) x rows + container top and bottom padding)

data.name: lblCarouselRSliderWPXInfo.Text
data.value: ((item width + item left and right padding) x columns + container left and right padding)

data.name: lblFCMainPictureWH.Help
data.value: Width and height of main picture and container in pixels.

data.name: lblFCRAutoplay.Help
data.value: Number of seconds from one transition to another, if not stopped. Set to 0 to disable autoplay.

data.name: lblFCRControlAlpha.Help
data.value: Alpha of a control, when mouse is not over.

data.name: lblFCRControlAlphaOver.Help
data.value: Alpha of a control, when mouse is over.

data.name: lblFCRControlDistance.Help
data.value: Distance between the controls (from the borders).

data.name: lblFCRControlsAlign.Help
data.value: Type of alignment from the point [controlsX, controlsY] - can be center, left or right.

data.name: lblFCRControlSize.Help
data.value: Size of the controls, which appear on rollover (play, stop, info, link).

data.name: lblFCRControlsX.Help
data.value: X-position of the point, which aligns the controls (measured from [0,0] of the image).

data.name: lblFCRControlsY.Help
data.value: Y-position of the point, which aligns the controls (measured from [0,0] of the image).

data.name: lblFCRCubeDistance.Help
data.value: The distance between the cubes during transition. Values between 5 and 50 are recommended. But go for experiments.:).

data.name: lblFCRDelay.Help
data.value: Delay between the start of one cube to the start of the next cube.

data.name: lblFCRDepthOffset.Help
data.value: The offset during transition on the z-axis. Value between 100 and 1000 are recommended. But go for experiments. :)

data.name: lblFCRDropShadowAlpha.Help
data.value: Alpha of the drop shadow - 0 == no shadow, 1 == opaque.

data.name: lblFCRDropShadowBlurX.Help
data.value: Blur of the drop shadow on the x-axis.

data.name: lblFCRDropShadowBlurY.Help
data.value: Blur of the drop shadow on the y-axis.

data.name: lblFCRDropShadowScale.Help
data.value: As the shadow is blurred, it appears wider that the actual image, when not resized. Thus it‘s a good idea to make it slightly smaller. - 1 would be no resizing at all.

data.name: lblFCRFCRLoaderColor.Help
data.value: Color of the cubes before the first image appears, also the color of the back sides of the cube, which become visible at some transition types.

data.name: lblFCRInfoBackground.Help
data.value: The background color of the info text field.

data.name: lblFCRInfoBackgroundAlpha.Help
data.value: The alpha of the background of the info text, the image shines through, when smaller than 1.

data.name: lblFCRInfoMargin.Help
data.value: The margin of the text field in the info section to all sides.

data.name: lblFCRInfoSharpness.Help
data.value: Sharpness of the info text (see above).

data.name: lblFCRInfoThickness.Help
data.value: Sharpness of the info text (see above).

data.name: lblFCRInfoWidth.Help
data.value: The width of the info text field.

data.name: lblFCRInnerSideColor.Help
data.value: Color of the inner sides of the cube when sliced.

data.name: lblFCRMenuColor1.Help
data.value: Color of an inactive menu item.

data.name: lblFCRMenuColor2.Help
data.value: Color of an active menu item.

data.name: lblFCRMenuColor3.Help
data.value: Color of the inner circle of an active menu item. Should equal the background color of the whole thing.

data.name: lblFCRMenuDistanceX.Help
data.value: Distance between two menu items (from center to center).

data.name: lblFCRMenuDistanceY.Help
data.value: Distance of the menu from the bottom of the image.

data.name: lblFCRPieces.Help
data.value: Number of pieces to which the image is sliced.

data.name: lblFCRSideShadowAlpha.Help
data.value: Sides get darker when moved away from the front. This is the degree of darkness - 0 == no change, 1 == 100% black.

data.name: lblFCRTime.Help
data.value: Time for one cube to turn.

data.name: lblFCRTime.Text
data.value: Time for one cube to turn:

data.name: lblFCRTooltipColor.Help
data.value: Color of the tooltip surface in the menu.

data.name: lblFCRTooltipHeight.Help
data.value: Height of the tooltip surface in the menu.

data.name: lblFCRTooltipMarginLeft.Help
data.value: Margin of the text to the left end of the tooltip.

data.name: lblFCRTooltipMarginRight.Help
data.value: Margin of the text to the right end of the tooltip.

data.name: lblFCRTooltipTextSharpness.Help
data.value: Sharpness of the tooltip text (-400 to 400) - see Adobe Docs.

data.name: lblFCRTooltipTextStyle.Help
data.value: The style of the tooltip text, specified in the CSS file.

data.name: lblFCRTooltipTextThickness.Help
data.value: Thickness of the tooltip text (-400 to 400) - see Adobe Docs.

data.name: lblFCRTooltipTextY.Help
data.value: Y-distance of the tooltip text field from the top of the tooltip.

data.name: lblIsDraggable.Help
data.value: This option enables support for touch input devices such as iPhone, iPad... The carousel can be controlled by mouse dragging or moving.

data.name: lblSlideDuration.Help
data.value: The time (in milliseconds) that the thumbnails page switch effect will take.

data.name: lblvDropShadowDistance.Help
data.value: Distance of the shadow from the bottom of the image.

data.name: lblCarouselArrNextPosH.Help
data.value: Arrow Horizontal Position. If Left then offset is calculated from left, else Right

data.name: lblCarouselArrNextPosH.Text
data.value: Next Arrow Horizontal position and Offset:

data.name: lblCarouselArrNextPosV.Help
data.value: Arrow Vertical Position. If Top then offset is calculated from top, else Bottom

data.name: lblCarouselArrNextPosV.Text
data.value: Next Arrow Vertical position and Offset:

data.name: lblCarouselArrPrevPosH.Help
data.value: Arrow Horizontal Position. If Left then offset is calculated from left, else Right

data.name: lblCarouselArrPrevPosH.Text
data.value: Previous Arrow Horizontal position and Offset:

data.name: lblCarouselItemInfDescriptionLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in description string to display in Item Container. Depends on html css tags in string

data.name: lblCarouselItemInfTitleLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in title string to display in Item Container

data.name: lblCarouselPagiInfo.Help
data.value: Pagination is displayed only if loop option is disabled.

data.name: lblCarouselPagiPosH.Help
data.value: Pagination Horizontal Position. If Left then offset is calculated from left, else Right

data.name: lblCarouselPagiPosV.Help
data.value: Pagination Vertical Position. If Top then offset is calculated from top, else Bottom

data.name: lblCarouselStripHtml.Help
data.value: Only text is displayed in rotator description place.

data.name: lblExport.Help
data.value: Settings are added to DropDownList from where you can load those settings. Setting are Saved to path - ModulePath/PreSettings/

data.name: lblExportSettingsName.Help
data.value: Name of XML file. Location of file - ModulePath/PreSettings/. Try not too use existing file name or it will be overwriten!

data.name: lblntautoStart.Help
data.value: Whether to start the news ticker animation automatically.

data.name: lblntpauseOnHover.Help
data.value: Whether the animation should be paused when the mouse hovers over the news ticker.

data.name: lblntshowControls.Help
data.value: Whether to show the pause, resume, next and previous buttons.

data.name: lblntShowTitleFromrescx.HElp
data.value: Show/hide ticker title from NewsTickerRotator.ascx.resx file.

data.name: lblntstylespeed.Help
data.value: Speed of selected style in milliseconds.

data.name: lblpkrautoplayInterval.Help
data.value: The interval at which the autoplay should progress at in milliseconds. This option is only used if autoplay is turned on. (default: 5000)..

data.name: lblpkrbackOpacity.Help
data.value: The opacity value of back images. (Value from 0 to 1).

data.name: lblpkrcarouselWidth.Help
data.value: The width/height of the rotator in pixelst.

data.name: lblpkrDescriptionLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in description string.

data.name: lblpkrfrontWidth.Help
data.value: The width/height of the front image in pixels.

data.name: lblpkrhAlign.Help
data.value: Horizontally/Vertically aligned position of the front image.

data.name: lblpkrleft.Help
data.value: This option is used if 'hAlign' option is set to left/right.

data.name: lblpkrreflectionHeight.Help
data.value: The height of the image reflection. The value is between 0 and 1.

data.name: lblpkrreflectionOpacity.Help
data.value: The starting opacity of the reflection. The range is 0 to 1.

data.name: lblpkrTitleLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in title string.

data.name: lblpkrtop.Help
data.value: The top/bottom position of the front image.

data.name: lblpkrvbuttonNav.Help
data.value: Type of navigation button that will be used: 'numbers', 'bullets', or 'none'. (default: 'none')..

data.name: lblSScaptionWidth.Help
data.value: Int (default 50): Percentage of slide taken by caption.

data.name: lblSSdescriptionLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in description string to display in Item Container. Depends on html css tags in string

data.name: lblSSkeyNav.Help
data.value: Bool (default true): Use left/right arrow keys to switch slide.

data.name: lblSSkeyNav.Text
data.value: Use left/right arrow keys to switch slide:

data.name: lblSStitleLenght.Help
data.value: Number of characters in title string to display in Item Container

data.name: lblSSuseArrows.Help
data.value: Navigation with previous and next arrows.

data.name: lblssWidthHeight.Help
data.value: The width/height of the rotator in pixelst.

data.name: lblDynamicallyFilterByCategory.Help
data.value: If this option is selected, the rotator will only display articles from the currently selected category of the news module, while navigating through multiple news categories on the page.

data.name: SaveSettingsError1.Text
data.value: Current portal does not have any news module instance with selected portal sharing settings.

data.name: SaveSettingsError2.Text
data.value: There is no category on selected news portal, please select another portal or create category or check display all categories.

data.name: SaveSettingsError3.Text
data.value: No News Instance on selected Sharing Portal. Please add news module instance.

data.name: SaveSettingsError4.Text
data.value: No News Instance, please add news module instance.

data.name: CacheContent.HelpText
data.value: Content is cached according to portal settings.

data.name: lblCacheContent.HelpText
data.value: If this option is switched on, the rotator's content will be cached. The rotator uses DNN portal's cache settings (Host > Host Settings > Advanced > Performance Settings).

data.name: lblModuleVisibility.HelpText
data.value: Here you can set when you wish the module to be visible on the page. If 'Module always visible' option is selected, the module is visible all the time. If 'Show module only when the news module displays the list of articles' option is selected, the rotator will only be visible when the news module displays the list of articles, yet it won't be visible when article details are displayed. If 'Show module only when the news module displays article details' option is selected, the rotator will only be visible when article details are displayed, yet it won't be visible when the list of articles is displayed. Note: The module is always visible to admin and host users.

data.name: lblChameleonHeightReferencesWidth.HelpText
data.value: Calculate the rotator's height as a ratio of it's width, i.e. if the height is set to 50%, the rotator's height will be exactely half of it's width.

data.name: lblNewsFilterBy.HelpText
data.value: This option allows for displaying articles only, or events only, or both.

data.name: lblFilterByArticleTags.HelpText
data.value: If this option is selected, the rotator will only display related articles by tags.

data.name: lblChameleonStripHtml.HelpText
data.value: Only text is displayed in rotator description place.

data.name: lblMultiRWidthHeight.Help
data.value: The base width/height of slides. It helps the slider to resize in correct ratio.

data.name: lblMultiRSpace.Help
data.value: The spacing value between slides in pixels.

data.name: lblMultiRGrabCursor.Help
data.value: Whether the slider uses grab mouse cursor.

data.name: lblMultiRSwipe.Help
data.value: Whether the drag/swipe navigation is enabled.

data.name: lblMultiRPreload.Help
data.value: Specifies number of slides which will be loaded by slider. 0 value means slider will load slides in sequence and 'all' value means slider will load all of the slides at starting. This option is only effective for images which has 'data-src' attribute.

data.name: lblMultiRFullwidth.Help
data.value: It enables the slider to adapt width to its parent element. It's very useful for creating full-width sliders. In default it takes max width as its base width value.

data.name: lblMultiRFullheight.Help
data.value: It enables the slider to adapt height to its parent element.

data.name: lblMultiRAutofill.Help
data.value: It enables the slider to adapt width and height to its parent element. It's very useful for creating fullscreen slider.

data.name: lblMultiRHeightLimit.Help
data.value: It force the slide to use max height value as its base specified height value.

data.name: lblMultiRAutoHeight.Help
data.value: Whether the slider adapts its height to each slide height or not. It overrides heightLimit option.

data.name: lblMultiRSmoothHeight.Help
data.value: Whether the slider uses smooth animation while its height changes.

data.name: lblMultiREndPause.Help
data.value: Whether the slider pauses slideshow when it reachs to last slide.

data.name: lblMultiROverPause.Help
data.value: Whether the slider pauses slideshow on hover.

data.name: lblMultiRFillMode.Help
data.value: Specifies the slide background scaling method. Its acceptable values are 'fill', 'fit', 'stretch', 'center' and 'tile'.

data.name: lblMultiRCenterControls.Help
data.value: Whether the slider aligns UI controls to center. This option is only effective in full width mode.

data.name: lblMultiRLayersMode.Help
data.value: It accepts two values 'center' and 'full'. The 'center' value indicates that the slider aligns layers to the center. This option is only effective in full width mode.

data.name: lblMultiRHideLayers.Help
data.value: Whether the slider hides all layers before changing slide.

data.name: lblMultiRSpeed.Help
data.value: Specifies slide changing speed. It accepts float values between 0 and 100.

data.name: lblMultiRDir.Help
data.value: Specifies slide changing direction. It accepts two values 'h' (horizontal) and 'v' (vertical).

data.name: lblMultiRTransitionType.Help
data.value: You can change type of slide transitions in slider options.

data.name: lblMultiRfullscreen.Help
data.value: Forces the slider to adapt width and height to the browser window dimension.

data.name: lblMultiRfullscreenMargin.Help
data.value: Specifies margin space at the bottom of slider.
